scripts.start: watchify src/main.js src/main.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] --standalone youDrawIt -o demo/youDrawIt.js -v
scripts.build: browserify src/main.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] --standalone youDrawIt > dist/youDrawIt.js
scripts.buildMin: browserify src/main.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] --standalone youDrawIt | uglifyjs -cm > dist/youDrawIt.min.js
